microcopy.text: Coinbase One members' locks are weighted 1.3x when the Flight School bonus is calculated

microcopy.text: Every four weeks, the Aerodrome Flight School program distributes bonus veAERO to qualifying users.
To qualify for a Flight School bonus, users must create a new lock of at least 2,500 veAERO within that class period (each class lasts four weeks).
microcopy.purpose: Defines minimum threshold and time window
